title: mithrillde
author: mithrillde
content: Hello all, need 250$ loan to pay for rent. Slightly delayed salary due to the war. Repayment: 140$ 12-14.06, 150$ 06.07-08.07As collateral i can provide: League of Legends accounts (Several is Master League on EUW with alot of skins/stuff) / Steam acc / Any other online stuff.Also i have 2300 dogecoins that i can send as collateral (but i understand that is ~170$ is not enough), tho dogecoins + some accounts should be ok i guess. Or anything you need (maybe u are league of legends fun, i got my own boosting/account service in past *I have a good reputation and topics in many specialized forums*)   Important: Paying to a Visa card is the only way to send money to Ukraine with a minimum commission. So Visa would be great. Or Western Union/Moneygramm if possible to my ID'sI will be the first to provide accounts and throw off dogecoins to the trusted lender. Thanks

comments.author: condoras

Repayment: 140$ 12-14.06, 150$ 06.07-08.07As collateral i can provide: League of Legends accounts (Several is Master League on EUW with alot of skins/stuff) / Steam acc / Any other online stuff.Also i have 2300 dogecoins that i can send as collateral (but i understand that is ~170$ is not enough), tho dogecoins + some accounts should be ok i guess. Or anything you need (maybe u are league of legends fun, i got my own boosting/account service in past *I have a good reputation and topics in many specialized forums*)   Important: Paying to a Visa card is the only way to send money to Ukraine with a minimum commission. So Visa would be great. Or Western Union/Moneygramm if possible to my ID'sI will be the first to provide accounts and throw off dogecoins to the trusted lender. ThanksYour whole post is full of red flags, plus your so-called "collateral", is worthless here. Better lock your topic and look elsewhere, before it's too late.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: condoras seems to know when someone is lying it seems magical powers can i learn them somewhere condoras?
